column2: BRIEF-American Vanguard Reports Q1 Earnings Per Diluted Share Of $0.16 May 8 (Reuters) - American Vanguard Corp: * NET SALES OF $104.1 MILLION IN Q1 2018, COMPARED TO $70.7 MILLION IN Q1 2017 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13, REVENUE VIEW $103.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
